00013 #include <QHeaderView>

00017 #include <QString>

00019 FlatViewParametersTab::FlatViewParametersTab(View* view, QWidget *parent): 
00020 QWidget(parent),
00021 view_(view),
00022 addRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/add.png"), QString(), this),
00023 removeRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/remove.png"), QString(), this),
00024 tableView_(this), model_(&(view->getParameters()), this),
00025 proxy_(this) {
00026 
00027         connect(&addRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00028                 &model_, SLOT(onAddRow()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00029         connect(&removeRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00030                 this, SLOT(onRemove()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00031 
00032         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00033                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00034         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(dataChanged(const QModelIndex&, const QModelIndex&)),
00035                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00036         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00037                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00038         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00039                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00040 
00041         // set view to be sortable
00042         tableView_.setSortingEnabled(true);
00043         tableView_.horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00044         tableView_.horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::ResizeToContents);
00045         tableView_.setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00046         tableView_.setAlternatingRowColors(true);
00047         //view_.setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectRows);
00048         tableView_.verticalHeader()->hide();
00049         tableView_.setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::AllEditTriggers);
00050         tableView_.setWordWrap(true);
00051 
00052         tableView_.setItemDelegate(new ParametersDelegate(this));
00053 
00054         // set source model for proxy
00055         proxy_.setSourceModel(&model_);
00056         // set proxy to be the source for the view
00057         tableView_.setModel(&proxy_);
00058 
00059         // sort the view
00060         tableView_.sortByColumn(0, Qt::AscendingOrder);
00061 
00062         QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00063         buttonLayout->addWidget(&addRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00064         buttonLayout->addWidget(&removeRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00065         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00066 
00067         // create the layout, add widgets to it
00068         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00069         layout->addWidget(&tableView_);
00070         layout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00071 }

00073 FlatViewParametersTab::~FlatViewParametersTab() {
00074 }

00076 bool FlatViewParametersTab::isValid() const {
00077         return model_.isValid();
00078 }
00079 
00080 void FlatViewParametersTab::restoreChanges() {
00081         model_.restore();
00082 }
00083 
00084 void FlatViewParametersTab::applyChanges() {
00085         model_.apply();
00086 }
00087 
00088 void FlatViewParametersTab::onRemove() {
00089         QModelIndex index = proxy_.mapToSource(tableView_.currentIndex());
00090 
00091         // if index is valid then remove the row
00092         if (index.isValid())
00093                 model_.onRemoveRow(index.row());
00094 }
